author: Bellular News
description:
Go to https://ground.news/Bellular for 40% off unlimited access with the Vantage Plan - the best deal of the year for my subscribers and only available for a limited time! Sponsored by Ground.

Consumers and regulators are getting sick of predatory business practices in gaming. Action is just around the corner, and for the industries big players, that's an alarming prospect. 

00:00 - Why Europe's Gaming CEOs Are Breaking Their Silence
02:59 - The New Rules That Change Everything
05:27 - Six Months Later, The Industry Responds
08:12 - What The EU Doesn't Understand About Gaming
13:36 - The Part Where They've Got A Point
17:12 - The Deadline Nobody's Ready For
